ring has been made by securing the 2 baggy loops into a very small double-loop ring become familiar with what this looks like because eventually this is what you will be using as the center ring of the motifs instead of the chain 4 ring like we used to do in the traditional method now that you have the completed floating ring it will not unravel if you stop pinching it but it is always a good idea to hang on to it until you start working stitches in to it if for some reason you do let go of it don t worry it won t be ruined however there s a good chance that it will distort making it will be harder to recognise later on again don t worry too much if you are not understanding how all this fits together for now it is important that you just focus on the skill of making a floating ring until it becomes fairly natural to do i highly recommend practicing over and over until you can do this without looking at the instructions and you manage to reach a good level of proficiency it is also important to understand that the amount of bagginess of your baggy loops determines the size of the floating ring ideally since we will be working with very small motifs it is best to have the ring as tight as possible therefore the aim is to pinch the loops as close as you can to the hook however for the time being just work at your own level and get the loops as tight as you can the ability to work very small floating loops will come in time with practice 9 floating double_crochet lesson now that you re an expert at making floating rings it s time to make a floating double_crochet in its entirety the good news is this is a no-brainer all you have to do is sandwich the floating ring in the middle of a double_crochet step 1 yo step 2 make a floating ring fr and then finish off the double_crochet step 3 yo pull through 2 loops twice that s right all you have to do is make an extra yo just before you make the floating ring then make the floating ring and then finish off the double_crochet as per usual by drawing a yo through 2 loops twice discussion at this point we will pause and reflect over the significance of the yo in step 1 this first yo enables us
